channel.title: Bethesda Brink Screenshot
channel.description:
Okay, so if you've seen this picture and Half-Life's signature drawing of the lambda, you know straight away this is the one and only, Half-Life specific lambda on this idiot's shirt.
[url]https://media1.gameinformer.com/imagefeed/featured/bethesda/brink/brinkdevfour610.jpg[/url]
There is also an "H" next to it to the left.
[COLOR='Red']NO: THIS IS NOT AN IGNORANT BELIEF THAT THIS IS SOME VALVE BETHESDA OR HALF-LIFE 2 EPISODE 3 IS COMING BS.
I guess you could conclude that this is because valve is the software distributor of it and the splash damage inc logo is next to it. But is this really called for?

item.title: Bethesda Brink Screenshot
item.dc:creator: Sampdel
item.description:
pfannkuchen_gesicht:

look closer to the one on the screenshot. looks quite different.
I do write it like the one in the screenshot as well, because it’s easier for me than drawing a curve with a line which really looks like a Lambda.

You use it on a regular basis?

Read full topic

item.title: Bethesda Brink Screenshot
item.dc:creator: bobbo
item.description:
pfannkuchen_gesicht:

look closer to the one on the screenshot. looks quite different.
I do write it like the one in the screenshot as well, because it’s easier for me than drawing a curve with a line which really looks like a Lambda.

I wasn’t agreeing with him… I can see the similarities between the two and the differences…

I was just pointing out the fact that people are stupid and attempt turn every thread upside down for no apparent reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Bethesda Brink Screenshot
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
bobbo:

No he isnt…

He simply stated that it looks like the DESIGN Valve made up for their lambda. Not… “Valve created greek symbol for wavelength”

See the difference between a normal lambda symbol and Half-Life’s Lambda symbol?

Normal:

Half-Life’s:

See the difference? If not… Go back to kindergarten and look at picture books.

look closer to the one on the screenshot. looks quite different.
I do write it like the one in the screenshot as well, because it’s easier for me than drawing a curve with a line which really looks like a Lambda.

Read full topic

item.title: Bethesda Brink Screenshot
item.dc:creator: JayJay
item.description:
bobbo:

READ THE FUCKING OP. My god… No where in there does he state that “Valve created the lambda”.

People start shit on these forums for no apparent reason I guess.

No but he is saying that it is a lambda sign therefore it has something to do with Half Life. People are pointing out that the lambda isn’t used only for HL

They’re not shit starting at all, they’re just not jumping to conclusions.

Read full topic
